titleStmt.title: A Brief survey of the old religion which may serve as a guide to all passengers, yet members of the militant church desirous to know & keep, among divers wayes, the old-good-way to Heaven ...

notesStmt.note: Place of publication suggested by Wing.
Imperfect: item at 1647:7 tightly bound, with slight loss of print.
Reproductions of original in the British Library (reel 1647), and the Congregational Library, London (reel 1944).
